name: Dots!
description:
WELCOME TO DOTS!

Dots! An exciting game built on an easy and relaxed gaming experience. You just need to relax and enjoy the gameplay for many hours.

How to play?

Just click or tap at any screen position to shoot the dot, and don't touch the dots on the circle.

Replayability!

More than one thousand two hundred levels that will drag you on for long game hours with the possibility of full replayability!
